TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供使用者介面的基底類別，讓您在設計階段中選取和編輯連接字串 (Connection String) 屬性。

span.span: Provides a base class for a user interface to select and edit a connection string property at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別是可以用在設計階段中，選取和編輯連接字串運算式，並將運算式指派給控制項屬性的物件。An instance of the class is a object that can be used at design time to select and edit a connection string expression and to assign the expression to a control property. 例如，控制項會使用類別在設計階段設定的值屬性。For example, the control uses the class at design time to set the value of the property. 使用產生關聯的屬性與屬性。Use the attribute to associate the with a property. 當設計介面上編輯相關聯的屬性時，設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法。When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the method. 方法會顯示使用者介面，讓建置連接字串運算式，並傳回使用者所選取的連接字串。The method displays a user interface for building the connection string expression and returns the connection string that is selected by the user. 方法會指出使用者介面的顯示樣式。The method indicates the display style of the user interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立關聯的執行個體類別包含在自訂控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to associate an instance of the class with a property that is contained within a custom control. 在設計介面中，編輯控制項屬性時類別會提供使用者介面，以選取和編輯屬性值的連接字串。When the control property is edited in the design surface, the class provides the user interface to select and edit a connection string for the property value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design.connectionstringeditor/CS/ConnectionStringEditorSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design.connectionstringeditor/VB/ConnectionStringEditorSample.vb#2)]

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

Working with Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EditValue (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, provider As IServiceProvider, value As Object) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EditValue(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, IServiceProvider ^ provider, System::Object ^ value);

abstract member EditValue : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * IServiceProvider * obj -> obj override this.EditValue : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * IServiceProvider * obj -> obj

span.span: An to use to gain additional context information.

param.name: provider
param.span: 服務提供者物件，可透過它取得編輯的服務。

span.span: A service provider object through which to obtain editing services.

param.name: value
param.span: 要編輯的物件執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the object being edited.

summary.span: 使用指定的服務提供者和內容，編輯指定之物件的值。

span.span: Edits the value of the specified object by using the specified service provider and context.

returns.span: 選取的連接運算式 (做為字串物件)，否則，如果未選取連接運算式，則為傳入的相同 。

span.span: The selected connection expression, as a string object; otherwise, if a connection expression was not selected, the same that was passed in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動使用者介面，用於編輯`value`物件。The method starts the user interface for editing the `value` object. 設計工具主應用程式呼叫連接字串編輯器相關聯的方法時編輯的屬性值。The designer host calls the method when you edit the value of a property that the connection string editor is associated with. 輸入的服務提供者用來取得任何所需中的編輯服務方法。The input service provider is used to obtain any editing services that are required within the method. 如果服務實作中指定的內容，支援方法會初始化控制項，會提示您選取現有的連接運算式，或建立新的連接運算式。If an service implementation is supported in the specified context, the method initializes a control, which prompts you to select an existing connection expression or build a new connection expression. 如果服務實作不支援在指定的內容中，方法會顯示簡單的執行個體的類別，會提示您輸入的連接運算式字串。If an service implementation is not supported in the specified context, the method displays a simple instance of the class, which prompts you to enter the connection expression string. 如果您取消，而不選取連接運算式字串，傳回的物件是相同`value`參數。If you cancel without selecting a connection expression string, the returned object is the same as the `value` parameter.

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

abstract member GetEditStyle : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle override this.GetEditStyle : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle

span.span: An to use to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 為指定的內容傳回與連接字串編輯器關聯的編輯樣式。

span.span: Returns the editing style that is associated with the connection string editor for the specified context.

returns.span: 列舉值，表示所提供之使用者介面的編輯樣式。

span.span: An enumeration value that indicates the editing style for the provided user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，方法類別會傳回值。By default, the method of the class returns the value. 如果服務實作中指定的內容，支援方法會傳回值。If an service implementation is supported in the specified context, the method returns the value. 如果在指定的內容中，不支援方法方法會傳回值。If the method is not supported in the specified context, the method returns the value.

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

param.name: instance
param.span: 或衍生類別的執行個體。

span.span: A or an instance of a derived class.

summary.span: 為 類別之提供的執行個體傳回提供者名稱。

span.span: Returns the provider name for the provided instance of the class.
Always an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會取得目前的執行個體的提供者名稱類別。The method gets the provider name for the current instance of the class. 例如，在類別，衍生自類別，方法會傳回提供者名稱。For example, in the class, which is derived from class, the method returns the provider name.

param.name: instance

span.span: A or an instance of a derived class.
A .

summary.span: 將提供者名稱放置到 類別之指定的執行個體上。

span.span: Puts the provider name on the specified instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法上設定的提供者名稱`instance`參數。The method sets the provider name on the `instance` parameter. 例如，在`SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor`，其衍生自類別，這可能是設定提供者名稱或將新增物件，如果連線已設定的連線。For example, in the `SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor`, which derives from the class, this either sets the provider name or adds an object, if the connection is a configured connection. 在此實作中，方法不做任何動作。In this implementation, the method does nothing.

span.span: Working with Connection Strings
